definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: We do some research on binarization of gray image and character segmentation.
sentences.chinese: 研究了灰度文本图像二值化及字符分割。

sentences.english: Image distortion correction includes spatial correction and gray-level correction.
sentences.chinese: 图像畸变校正包括空间位置校正和灰度校正。

sentences.english: A novel method for detecting LSB matching steganography in grayscale images is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 对灰度图像LSB匹配隐写提出了一种新的检测方法。

sentences.english: The algorithm has been successfully used to segment a number of gray level texture images.
sentences.chinese: 该算法成功地分割了许多灰度级图像。

sentences.english: This algorithm can help geometric transformation to avoid the loss of intensity of images.
sentences.chinese: 将该方法用于图象几何变换可以避免灰度的损失。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the clinical application of sine grey level transformation of X-ray medical images.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨X线图像正弦灰度变换技术临床应用价值。

sentences.english: The simulated results indicate that 16-level gray-scale can be generated.
sentences.chinese: 仿真结果显示，该方案能够实现16级灰度显示。

sentences.english: The weight-average method was applied to make the original image to the grayscale image.
sentences.chinese: 在图像灰度化的阶段是采用了加权平均值的方法。

sentences.english: The grey-scale and texture features may describe the target in SAR image accurately.
sentences.chinese: 灰度和纹理特征能确切地描述SAR图像中的目标。

sentences.english: This paper presents a novel blind grayscale digital watermark algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种新的盲灰度级水印算法。

sentences.english: It’s also important to note that Grayscale JPGs do not compress nearly as much as color ones do.
sentences.chinese: 还要重点注意灰度图不能压缩得像彩图同样程度。

sentences.english: The color images of apple were extracted and greyed using different algorithms.
sentences.chinese: 提取苹果目标，使用不同算法灰度化图像。

sentences.english: For gray-scale images, a knowledge-based face detection methods.
sentences.chinese: 针对灰度图像，提出一种基于知识的人脸检测方法。

sentences.english: This dissertation employs gray-scale concurrence matrix as a tool to analyze texture of rusts as well.
sentences.chinese: 最后基于灰度共生矩阵法对锈斑进行了纹理分析。

sentences.english: For a grayscale image, the bit depth quantifies how many unique shades are available.
sentences.chinese: 对于灰度图像，位深度量化有多少独特的色调。

sentences.english: A discrete algorithm for grayscale image resizing through binary image zooming in 3D space is presented.
sentences.chinese: 从简单的二值图像出发提出灰度图像的离散放缩算法。

definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
warm color (arch.)/esp. yellow, orange or red
black-or-white (e.g. good or bad, with no middle ground)
